title: 615: Harvey Weinstein, Trump’s IQ Challenge, The Last Jedi, Costco vs Amazon [Mind Pump Riffs on Current Events]
description:
In this episode, Sal, Adam & Justin riff on headlines chosen by Taylor and read by Doug.

  • Prancercise (3:52)
  • Maui/Onion flavored macadamia nuts at Thrive Market? Sal hopes so! (9:08)
  • Josh Trent the know it all (10:56)
  • Harvey Weinstein sexual misconduct reports (13:20)
  • Trump at it again… (26:10)
  • Breaking down new Star Wars trailer (34:22)
  • Costco launching new delivery service (45:20)
  • How will tech affect fitness (50:43)

Related Links/Products Mentioned:

    • Free shipping on orders of $49 or more
  • Harvey Weinstein Raped Three Women, 'New Yorker' Reports (article)
  • Sal’s glamour shots
  • Trump Just Challenged Rex Tillerson to an IQ Test (article)
  • Dan Bilzerian, Dakota Meyer feud over Las Vegas shooting intensifies (article)
  • CrashCourse – (YouTube)
